description: This Dart source file defines a theme customization function for a Flutter application using Material 3 design. It constructs a consistent color scheme, text theme, and styles for various UI components such as AppBar, Card, Checkbox, Slider, Chip, ElevatedButton, FilledButton, and InputDecoration, tailored to an 'Ocean' aesthetic.

methods.name: buildOceanTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns a custom ThemeData object configured with an Ocean-inspired color scheme and styles for Flutter widgets.
